description: Thanksgiving dinner can be stressful, but make it easier on yourself by preparing some fun cocktails beforehand! This Sparkling Cranberry Quencher recipe is perfect for your&nbsp;holiday feast and will wow all of your guests. It's also simple-to-make and best served cold!
name: Sparkling Cranberry Quencher

recipeInstructions.name: In a large pitcher, muddle orange wedges with sugar. Add cranberry juice and seltzer water to the pitcher and stir well.
recipeInstructions.text: In a large pitcher, muddle orange wedges with sugar. Add cranberry juice and seltzer water to the pitcher and stir well.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour in vodka just before serving over ice cubes or chilled glasses.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour in vodka just before serving over ice cubes or chilled glasses.
